creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: embroidered vest with dyed indigo panels and black fabric panels; embroidery colors are red, rust, pink, purple, blue, green, gold and cream; woven rust colored loops for white buttons; designs of diamonds, diagonals, triangles, feather-like shapes, zigzags; 1" stand-up collar in black fabric; small pocket at upper PL of front panel; red panel lining under embroidered sections of the front
title: Vest (sidriye)
